name: ansible-project
description: Node files that support the development of Ansible roles
author: Brian Zalewski <brian@megabyte.space> (https://megabyte.space)

scripts.fix:shellcheck: find . -type d \( -name .cache -o -name .git -o -name .modules  -o -name node_modules -o -name .husky \) -prune -o -type f \( -name \*.sh -o -name \*.sh.j2 \) -print0 | xargs -0 shellcheck -f diff | git apply
scripts.lint:hadolint: find . -type d \( -name .cache -o -name .git -o -name .modules  -o -name node_modules -o -name .husky -o -name test \) -prune -o -type f \( -name Dockerfile -o -name Dockerfile.j2 \) -print0 | xargs -0 -r -n1 docker run -v ${PWD}:/work -w /work hadolint/hadolint:latest hadolint
scripts.lint:shellcheck: find . -type d \( -name .cache -o -name .git -o -name .modules  -o -name node_modules -o -name .husky -o -name .start.sh \) -prune -o -type f \( -name \*.sh -o -name \*.sh.j2 \) -print0 | xargs -0 -r -n1 shellcheck
scripts.test:docker: SNAP_REFERENCES=$(grep -Ril "community.general.snap:" ./tasks) && if [ "$SNAP_REFERENCES" ]; then molecule test -s docker-snap; else molecule test -s docker; fi

scripts-info.commit: IMPORTANT: Whenever committing code run 'git-cz' or 'npm run commit' - this command will automatically test and prompt with an interactive questionnaire to populate proper commit messages
scripts-info.fix:shellcheck: Attempts to automatically fix shell scripts
scripts-info.info: Displays descriptions of all the npm tasks
scripts-info.lint:ansible: Runs ansible-lint which has rules specific to Ansible projects
scripts-info.lint:black: Runs Black which formats Python files
scripts-info.lint:docker: Runs hadolint on all Dockerfile and Dockerfile.j2 files
scripts-info.lint:flake8: Runs flake8 which lints Python files
scripts-info.lint:prettier: Checks for presence of files that Prettier wants to format differently
scripts-info.lint:yaml: Runs yamllint which is a general purpose linter for YAML files
scripts-info.misc:symlink-role: Adds role to ~/.ansible/roles/professormanhattan.role_name - you can use this when ansible-lint complains about role not being found
scripts-info.prepare-release: Prepares the repository for a release
scripts-info.shell:OS_NAME: Open a Docker shell session for debugging (OS_NAME can be archlinux, centos-7, centos-8, debian-9, debian-10, fedora-33, fedora-34, ubuntu-18.04, ubuntu-20.04, or ubuntu-21.04)
scripts-info.test: Runs molecule tests for all the supported operating systems using VirtualBox (this is RAM intensive)
scripts-info.test:docker: Runs molecule tests on all supported Linux environments using Docker (if the role contains a snap installation, then only flavors that support snap are tested)
scripts-info.test:local: Installs the role on your local machine
scripts-info.test:OS_NAME: Provisions a full desktop VirtualBox VM, installs the role(s), and does not delete the VM after testing for further inspection (OS NAME can be archlinux, centos, debian, fedora, macos, ubuntu, or windows)
scripts-info.update: Runs .start.sh to automatically update meta files and documentation
scripts-info.version: Used by 'npm run prepare-release' to update the CHANGELOG
